Description: On I-95 at mile marker 170 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The north exit ramp narrows.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 81.6 in the County of Henrico, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled tractor trailer. The south right lane and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Disabled Tractor Trailer

Description: On VA-28 in the County of Loudoun, in the vicinity of Ex Ramp To, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The south right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-77 at mile marker 62.4 in the County of Bland, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The south left shoulder, left lane, and right lane are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash
